page.title: 05HISTORY CONTINUED
page.content: {BRIEF HISTORY OF CEFN MEIRIADOG {C.P.SCHOOL. { } THE TEACHER WHO HAD NOT CLOSED THE TENT FLAP WAS NOT VERY POPULAR WITH MISS D.JONES.INSIDE THE MAIN VESTRY HAD A COKE STOVE TO HEAT THE WATER FOR CUPS OF TEA AT DINNER TIMES.IN THE SUMMER WHEN THE COKE STOVE WAS NOT ON,HOT WATER WAS PROVIDED BY MISS WILLIAMS.IN RETURN THE OLDER BOYS TOOK A WATER CART TO THE WATER WORKS AND FILLED IT FOR HER.IN 1933 MR.A.C.DAVIES TOOK CHARGE AFTER MISS D.JONES LEFT TO GET MARRIED.HE WAS SUCCEEDED BY MR.J.M.CHARLES IN 1936,UNTIL HE RETIRED IN 1977.IN 1970 MISS W.JONES RETIRED AFTER 41 YEARS TEACHING AT THE OLD AND THE NEW SCHOOLS.IN 1978 THE CEFN MEIRIADOG V.P. SCHOOL CLOSED DUE TO INSUFFICIENT NUMBERS.FOUR OF THE CHILDREN CAME TO THIS SCHOOL.
